question: What should i study?
answer:
QUESTION

i want to know that which professional field will be fine to me.also tell me about job scope what should i study as i want to conitue my studies i want to do my masters but from one person of dawat e islami i came to know that none of MSc is fine for me but in telecom field he said that it is very good to u but it seems to be not good what should i do now please kindly tell me that what field i should join and also in which subject i should have to do my masters he told me to join wateen telecom he said that it will be very good for uu will be adjusted over there but it did not happened there what should i do now and what is going on with me please answer me as soon as possible

ANSWER


Share:

In the name of Allah, Most Gracious, Most Merciful

Assalaamu `alaykum waRahmatullahi Wabarakatuh  

You should consult with people in different professions and get an understanding of their fields and its demand.  Then, analyze which of those fields are interesting to you and you believe you could earn a halāl income from it.  After you are inclined towards one particular field, you should make istikhārah and seek guidance from Allāh Ta’ālā.

There is nothing “going on” with you as many people face confusion and indecision in such matters.  InshāAllāh, with mashwarah (consultation), istikhārah, and du’ās, Allāh Ta’ālā will grant barakah in your decision.

And Allah knows best

Wassalaamu `alaykum

Ml. Abrar Mirza,
Student Darul Iftaa
